mainSequence.step: Create Transaction UUID (for reference and maintaining correct state)
Set lock_height for transaction kernel (current chain height)
Select inputs using desired selection strategy
Calculate sum inputs blinding factors xI
Create change_output
Select blinding factor xC for change_output
Create lock function sF that locks inputs and stores change_output in wallet and identifying wallet transaction log entry TS linking inputs + outputs (Not executed at this point)
Calculate tx_weight: MAX(-1 * num_inputs + 4 * (num_change_outputs + 1), 1) (+1 covers a single output on the receiver's side)
Calculate fee: tx_weight * 1_000_000 nG
Calculate total blinding excess sum for all inputs and outputs xS1 = xC - xI (private scalar)
Select a random nonce kS (private scalar)
Subtract random kernel offset oS from xS1. Calculate xS = xS1 - oS
Multiply xS and kS by generator G to create public curve points xSG and kSG
Add values to Slate for passing to other participants: UUID, inputs, change_outputs, fee, amount, lock_height, kSG, xSG, oS
Sender sends Slate to Recipient
Recipient checks fee against number of inputs, change_outputs +1 * receiver_output
Recipient creates receiver_output
Recipient chooses random blinding factor for receiver_output xR (private scalar)
Recipient calculates message M = fee | lock_height
Recipient chooses random nonce kR (private scalar)
Recipient multiplies xR and kR by generator G to create public curve points xRG and kRG
Recipient computes Schnorr challenge e = SHA256(kRG + kSG | xRG + xSG | M)
Recipient computes Recipient Schnorr signature sR = kR + e * xR
Recipient adds sR, xRG, kRG to Slate
Recipient creates wallet output function rF that stores receiver_output in wallet with status "Unconfirmed" and identifying transaction log entry TR linking receiver_output with transaction
Recipient confirms receiver_output
Recipient changes status of receiver_output to "Confirmed"
Sender creates final transaction tx from Slate
Sender posts tx to mempool
Grin Node confirms and sends "Ok" to Recipient
Recipient sends "Ok" - UUID to Sender
Sender executes wallet lock function sF
Recipient confirms receiver_output
Recipient changes status of receiver_output to "Confirmed"
Sender confirms change_output
Sender changes status of inputs to "Spent"
Sender changes status of change_output to "Confirmed"
Sender unlocks inputs and deletes change_output identified in transaction log entry TS
